data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Borowiec, Lech (2006): Four new species of Discomorpha Chevrolat, 1837 (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Cassidinae: Omocerini), with key to Discomorpha s. str. Zootaxa 1357: 45-60, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.273609
